attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is about time that the current government paid front line police officers for the excellent work they do. Each and every one puts there lives on the line every day. The current pay negotiations have broken down yet again. Yet again the govenment is trying to obtain a public service on the cheap. This action only demolorises staff. Come on PM give these hardworking public servants at least 5% rise every year for the next 5 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
